::Rex::

Rex nods. "I see."

He never liked walking outside, there was a threat of an ambush there. 
Besides, most of his time was spent slagging Preds, in the holo-rooms or in 
real life, so he didn't have much time for walks.

"Allright. Where did you want to go?"
